select A.title, B.subtitle, t.id,t.days, MIN(td.trd_time), ti.image_url, td.trd_price from tm_tour t left join tm_tour_image ti on t.id=ti.tour_id left join tm_tourdate td on t.id=td.tour_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT b.content title , a.id FROM tm_tour a JOIN ts_language b ON a.title = b.uuid and b.type='en') A ON t.id = A.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT b.content subtitle ,a.id FROM tm_tour a JOIN ts_language b ON a.subtitle = b.uuid and b.type='en') B ON t.id = B.id
GROUP BY t.id ORDER BY t.id limit #{number},6

select count(*) from (select MIN(td.trd_time), td.trd_price from tm_tour t left join tm_tour_image ti on t.id=ti.tour_id left join tm_tourdate td on t.id=td.tour_id
GROUP BY t.id) tour
